segments.text: Hi . Bob ! We've been working hard at our lessons for a fortnight . So why don't we take it easy this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about seeing a play ? I hear Hamlet is on at the National Theater .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( looking at a newspaper ) Oh , dear me ! There's no performance at the National theater this weekend . So we have to go to cinema instead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see .. um . Gone With the Wind . It is on at six cinemas on Saturday night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds interesting . Which is the nearest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't we go to the 7:30 show ? It is convenient to us , I think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we won't have enough time for dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to go to the earlier or the later show ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah ... I fancy going to the later show .
segments.speaker: S2
